title: "Dragonmancer"

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - "Magically" light someone on fire with your torch. This has a 50% chance of killing your target, and a 50% chance of roleblocking. Exactly one of these will always happen.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With the Necronomicon, learn magic. Your fire both kills and roleblocks at the same time, and your visits become astral.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Coven.

desc:
Post 4856
*"Like this?"*
*"...no, you just burned down an entire village. again."*
